Containers.Name: kurisu-coder
Containers.Description:
Run VS Code on a remote server. https://coder.com
How to use: Once the server starts, check the start log for the randomly generated password to login.
You can also use the below Post Arguments: -V, --version output the version number --cert "value" --cert-key "value" -e, --extensions-dir "dir" Set the root path for extensions. -d --user-data-dir "dir" Specifies the directory that user data is kept in, useful when running as root. --data-dir "value" DEPRECATED: Use '--user-data-dir' instead. Customize where user-data is stored. -h, --host "value" Customize the hostname. (default: "0.0.0.0") -o, --open Open in the browser on startup. -p, --port "number" Port to bind on. (default: 8443) -N, --no-auth Start without requiring authentication. -H, --allow-http Allow http connections. -P, --password "value" Specify a password for authentication. --disable-telemetry Disables ALL telemetry. --help output usage information
